task.title: Basic Car Maintenance
task.shortdesc: Essential maintenance procedures to keep your vehicle in optimal condition.

prereq.p: Before performing maintenance, ensure your vehicle is parked on a level surface with the engine off and cool.

context.p: Regular maintenance extends your vehicle's lifespan and prevents costly repairs.

info.p: Locate the dipstick, remove and wipe clean, reinsert fully, and check the oil level indication.
Use a tire pressure gauge to check all tires and inspect for abnormal wear patterns.
Check coolant, brake fluid, power steering fluid, and windshield washer fluid levels.

result.p: Your vehicle will operate more efficiently and reliably with regular maintenance.
